overview.name: Overview
overview.title: PostHog can help {companyName} build better products.
overview.description: By integrating PostHog into your app, you'll be able to understand your users, test new features, and ship improvements faster. Getting all of these capabilities through one SDK means you reduce overhead and can focus on building.

product_analytics.title: Understand your users
product_analytics.description: Track events, visualize trends, and build dashboards. See exactly how users interact with your product, where they drop off, and what keeps them coming back.

session_replay.title: See what users actually do
session_replay.description: Watch real user sessions to understand UX issues, debug problems, and see where users get stuck. Privacy-first with automatic PII redaction.

feature_flags.title: Ship features safely
feature_flags.description: Roll out features gradually, test with specific user segments, and instantly rollback if something goes wrong. All without redeploying.

experiments.title: Make data-driven decisions
experiments.description: Run A/B tests and multivariate experiments. PostHog's statistical engine tells you when results are significant and which variant wins.

pricing.name: Pricing
pricing.title: Transparent, usage-based pricing
pricing.description: Only pay for what you use. Set billing limits to control costs. Free tier includes up to 1M events per month.

cta.name: Get Started
cta.title: Ready to get started?
cta.description: Start with our generous free tier, or book a demo to learn more.
